title: You Are Life Itself — Guided Meditation with Mooji
description:
SATSANG OF THE WEEK
https://mooji.tv/satsang-of-the-week

A beautiful guided meditation with Mooji into the space of pure being. 

“Everything is in place for life to unfold in its natural way. Be aware of this. You are not apart from life, but life itself. 

You are simply here - undivided, whole, complete, happy. Be confirmed in your completeness.”

Sahaja Retreat 
18 September 2016 | Guided Meditation

~

This video is the ‘Satsang of the Week’ for 14 March 2021
Watch: https://mooji.tv/satsang-of-the-week
Subscribe for weekly notifications: 
https://mooji.org/subscribe-satsang-of-the-week

Watch more Guided Meditations by Mooji here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5FA923173CC5D690

More recent, potent talks available on Sahaja Express:
https://mooji.tv/subscription

If you would like to support the sharing of Satsang, you can donate here:
https://mooji.org/donate?tcode=mtv7

#Mooji #satsang #spirituality #advaita #nonduality #awakening
channelDescription:
OFFICIAL MOOJI YOUTUBE CHANNEL

Mooji brings the possibility of Self-realization into the here and now. His communication is simple, direct and immediate. An invitation to move from person to presence -- and ultimately, to liberation. He speaks to you.

Website: http://www.mooji.org

For many free videos, Sahaja Express subscription service and live broadcasts, please visit:
http://www.mooji.tv

This channel is run by Sri Mooji's team.

If you find any broken links or faulty videos, please let us know. Due to the nature of spontaneous recording, quality will vary. But if there is something we can do to correct or improve a video we are happy to know.

Please be aware that all material on this channel is copyright of Mooji Media Ltd., and cannot be reused or reposted without express permission from Mooji Media Ltd. 

To support this service and the worldwide sharing of Satsang, you can donate here: https://mooji.org/donate?tcode=mtv7
